result.execSummary:
The defendant Joshua Steven Ritchie was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Burglary-Building or Dwelling [Modifiers: Party to a Crime], a class F felony, Wisconsin Statutes 943.10(1m)(a).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

supervisions.notes: $3,000.00.  Joint and several with cases 14CF281 and 14CF280.  To be paid by 10/14/16.  Restitution to be paid first.

Pay all costs, fees and surcharges by 10/14/16.
AS TO RESTITUTION/ALL FINANCIAL OBLIGATIONS:  failure to pay by 10/14/16 is civil judgment to be entered with tax intercept.
Straight time.  Court orders Day Reporting Center if appropriate.  Court recommends against electronic monitoring.

Defendant shall provide a DNA sample  for the data bank if not previously given, pay all appropriate costs.
Court advised defendant that as a convicted felon he may never possess a firearm, ammunition or body armor. Court advised defendant that his voting rights are suspended and he may not vote in any election until his civil rights are restored.  Court advised defendant of his right to seek postconviction relief.

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Joshua Steven Ritchie

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

records.addlTxt: CORRECTION to Sentencing entry on 4/14/2015 to reflect correct restitution information.

Defendant Joshua Steven Ritchie in court with attorney Craig Robert Johnson.  Defendant Joshua Steven Ritchie in custody.  Brad Alan Vorpahl appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Sentencing proceeded.  Statements made as to sentencing.

AS TO COUNT 1
Court sentenced defendant to serve 6 MONTHS in the House of Correction with credit for 19 days served; Straight time. Court orders Day Report Center if appropriate. Court recommends against electronic monitoring.

Court ordered restitution in the amount of $3,000.00 joint and several with cases 14CF281 and 14CF280, to be paid by 10/14/2016 to Longino H. Restitution is to be paid first.

Court orders defendant to pay all cost, fees and surcharges by 10/14/2016 or a civil judgment to be entered with tax intercept.

Defendant shall provide a DNA sample for the Data Bank (if not previously given) and pay all appropriate costs.  Court advised defendant that as a convicted felon he may never possess a firearm, ammunition, or body armor. Court advised defendant that his voting rights are suspended and he may not vote in any election until his civil rights are restored. Court advised defendant of his right to seek postconviction relief.

Filed,
Notice of Right to Seek Postconviction Relief;
Pretrial Incarceration Credit Form.
Received and Filed, 4 letters on behalf of the defendant, 1 letter from the defendant, 2 letters from Renew Counseling Services. and two letters from Milwaukee Christian Center.

Defendant Joshua Steven Ritchie in court with attorney Craig Robert Johnson.  David T. Malone appeared for the State of Wisconsin.   Deputy court clerk: LMS.  

The defendant is not in compliance with the terms of the Deferred Prosecution Agreement.  Based upon the defendant's non-compliance and State's motion, the court revoked the Deferred Prosecution Agreement; proceedings reinstated.  Court orders entry of Judgment of Conviction.

State request defendant be remanded till sentencing.  Defendant argues against REMAND.   Court ordered defendant REMANDED into the custody of the Milwaukee County Sheriff's Department.  Sentencing hearing scheduled for April 14, 2015 at 08:30 am.
Deferred Prosecution Agreement Progress report, received and filed. lms
Clerk is contacted by defense counsel requesting an earlier court date.  Case is adjourned from 4/13/2015 to 3/31/2015.  lms

Defendant Joshua Steven Ritchie in court with attorney Craig Robert Johnson.  Brad Alan Vorpahl appeared for the State of Wisconsin.   Deputy court clerk: LMS.

Defendant has tested negative and attended all appointments.  Defendant needs to pay restitution and assessment fee, complete community service.  Defendant has had assessment, verification needed.  Review hearing scheduled for April 13, 2015 at 08:30 am.
Deferred Prosecution Agreement Progress report, received and filed. lms

Defendant Joshua Steven Ritchie in court with attorney Craig R. Johnson.  David T. Malone appeared for the State of Wisconsin.   Deputy court clerk: LMS.

Defendant has tested negative and attended all JusticePoint contacts.  Defendant needs to begin community service and pay restitution.  Defendant is no longer employed.  Review hearing scheduled for February 9, 2015 at 08:30 am.
JusticePoint Pretrial Services Report received and filed.  lms

Defendant Joshua Steven Ritchie in court with attorney Craig R. Johnson.  Jesica Ballenger appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy Court Clerk: dds.

Parties are prepared to enter into a deferred prosecution agreement.

Defendant was advised of constitution rights and maximum penalties, waived all rights and entered a plea of GUILTY.  Defendant examined as to the plea.  Plea Questionnaire/Waiver of Rights, Addendum, and Elements, received and filed.  Stipulation by parties to complaint as a factual basis to sustain the guilty plea.  Defendant further advised that if he is not a US citizen deportation is possible.  Court found the defendant guilty as charged in the Information.  Court STAYS entry of judgment of conviction.  Deferred Prosecution Agreement received, signed and filed.  Court ordered case adjourned for review hearing in Branch 6.  Review hearing scheduled for November 10, 2014 at 08:30 am.
Justice Point report, received and filed.

Defendant Joshua Steven Ritchie in court with attorney Craig R. Johnson.  Jesica Ballenger appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy Court Clerk: dds.

Matter calendared for Deferred prosecution agreement hearing.  Parties not prepared to proceed on today as defense still seeking monitoring agency.  Defense indicates that the defendant to be evaluated (staffed) by Justice Point on 8-27-14.  Defense request for adjournment granted; new date selected with the parties.  Defendant in compliance with Justice Point at this time.  Deferred prosecution agreement hearing scheduled for September 8, 2014 at 08:30 am.
Justice Point report, received and filed.
Restitution Worksheet, filed.

Defendant Joshua Steven Ritchie in court with attorney Craig R. Johnson.  Jesica Ann Ballenger appeared for the State of Wisconsin telephonically.  Deputy Court Clerk: dds.

Matter calendared for Plea Hearing on today.  Parties engaged in negotiations.  State still attempting to discuss proposed deferred prosecution agreement with the victim.  Defense request for adjournment granted by the court.  JusticePoint report reviewed with the parties.  Defendant admonished by the court as to missed office contact; no further action requested by the state.  Deferred prosecution agreement hearing scheduled for August 25, 2014 at 08:30 am.
JusticePoint report, received and filed.

Defendant Joshua Steven Ritchie in court with attorney Craig R Johnson.  Jesica A Ballenger appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy Court Clerk: dds.

Matter calendared for Plea Hearing on today.  The state is unable to proceed as the victim was not notified of today's proceedings.  New date selected with the parties.  Plea hearing scheduled for July 14, 2014 at 01:30 pm.

Defendant Joshua Steven Ritchie in court with Attorney Craig R Johnson.  Jesica A Ballenger appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy Court Clerk: dds.

Matter set for Deferred prosecution agreement hearing.  Defense requests for adjournment heard and granted.  Parties engaged in continued negotiations.  Parties in receipt of JusticePoint report; defendant in compliance at this time.
  Plea hearing scheduled for June 18, 2014 at 08:30 am.
JusticePoint report, received and filed.

Defendant Joshua Steven Ritchie in court with attorney Craig R. Johnson.  Jesica Ann Ballenger appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy Court Clerk: dds.
Status conference held between counsel.  Parties engaged in plea negotiations.  Defense requests date for possible resolution of this matter in drug treatment court.  JusticePoint report reviewed with the parties.  Defendant admonished by the court.  No action requested from the state at this time.  Deferred prosecution agreement hearing scheduled for May 20, 2014 at 08:30 am.
JusticePoint report, received and filed.

Defendant Joshua Steven Ritchie in court with attorney Craig R. Johnson.  Jesica Ann Ballenger appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy Court Clerk: dds.
Status conference held between all counsel.  Parties still engaged in negotiations.  State's request for additional time for investigation granted.  Status conference scheduled for April 8, 2014 at 01:30 pm.

Defendant Joshua Steven Ritchie in court with Attorney Craig R. Johnson.  Jesica Ann Ballenger appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy Court Clerk: dds.
Status conference held between the parties.  JusticePoint report reviewed with the parties. No action requested by the state, no action taken by the court.  Status conference scheduled for March 27, 2014 at 08:30 am.
JusticePoint report, received and filed.

Defendant Joshua Steven Ritchie in court with Attorney Craig R Johnson.  Megan Carmody for Jesica Ballenger appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy Court Clerk: dds.
Matter before the Court for Scheduling Conference.  Parties engaged in settlement negotiations.  Status conference scheduled for March 6, 2014 at 08:30 am.
JusticePoint report, received and filed.
Signed and filed, No Contact Order.  Defendant to have no contact with co-actors Antonio Perkins and James Perkins; and Logino H.

Defendant Joshua Steven Ritchie in court with attorney Craig R Johnson.  Benjamin Lindsay appeared for Jesica Ballenger for the State of Wisconsin.
Defendant waived Preliminary Hearing.  Preliminary Hearing Questionnaire and Waiver received and filed.  Court found probable cause and bound Defendant over for trial.  Defendant is advised this case is assigned to Judge Brash, Branch 21.   Original Information received and filed.  Copy given to Defense counsel who waived reading.  Defendant was arraigned in open court and pled not guilty. Court ordered case adjourned for Scheduling Conference in Branch 21.  Scheduling conference scheduled for 02-07-2014 at 08:30 am.

Court orders defendant TURNED OVER to JUSTICE Point for Supervision.  No use or possession of controlled substances without a valid prescription.  
Defendant advised it is a requirement to attend all future court proceedings.  Failure to comply with conditions of bail may result in an additional charge of bail jumping.

Defendant Joshua Steven Ritchie in court with attorney Christian T. Eichenlaub.  Defendant Joshua Steven Ritchie in custody.  Kevin Shomin appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy court clerk cmt.  Defendant is advised this case is assigned to Judge Brash, Branch 21.  Defendant given a copy of the complaint and advised of maximum penalties, right to counsel and right to a preliminary hearing.  Court reviewed the complaint and found probable cause to hold defendant for further proceedings.  DEFENDANT IS INDIGENT AND PUBLIC DEFENDER WILL PROVIDE COUNSEL.  Preliminary hearing scheduled for January 31, 2014 at 08:30 am.

ADDRESS INFO for Joshua Steven Ritchie
Current: 2508 West Rogers Street, Milwaukee, WI 53204   (Effective: 01-22-2014)
Prior: 2033 West Rogers Street, Milwaukee, WI 53204
Defendant in Custody, Court appearance today in Intake Court, Room 137A.
